titles.title: Authorizing the use of the Capitol Grounds for the Washington for Jesus 1996 prayer rally.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Public Buildings and Economic Development.

committee.name: House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure

bill.summary: 4/15/1996--Introduced. Permits One Nation Under God, Inc., to sponsor a free public event on the Capitol Grounds on April 29 and 30, 1996.
